title: (Domestic Electricity Accounts) Emergency Measures Act 2022 (No. 1 of
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Electricity Costs Emergency
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Electricity Costs Emergency 

Benefit Scheme Regulations 2022.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited electricity cost emergency benefit scheme regulation 2022

title: (Domestic Electricity Accounts) Emergency Measures Act 2022 (No. 1 of
heading: In these Regulations, “Act of 2022” means the Electricity Costs
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations, “Act of 2022” means the Electricity Costs 
(Domestic Electricity Accounts) Emergency Measures Act 2022 (No. 1 of 
2022).
text_norm: 2 regulation act 2022 mean electricity cost (domestic electricity accounts) emergency measure act 2022 (no 1 2022)

title: (Domestic Electricity Accounts) Emergency Measures Act 2022 (No. 1 of
heading: 3. 24 March 2022 is the date prescribed for the purposes of section 4(1)(a)
text_raw:
3. 24 March 2022 is the date prescribed for the purposes of section 4(1)(a) 

of the Act of 2022.
text_norm: 3 24 march 2022 date prescribed purpose section 4(1)(a) act 2022

title: (Domestic Electricity Accounts) Emergency Measures Act 2022 (No. 1 of
heading: 4. 29 March 2022 is the date prescribed for the purposes of section 4(1)(e)
text_raw:
4. 29 March 2022 is the date prescribed for the purposes of section 4(1)(e) 

of the Act of 2022.
text_norm: 4 29 march 2022 date prescribed purpose section 4(1)(e) act 2022

title: (Domestic Electricity Accounts) Emergency Measures Act 2022 (No. 1 of
heading: 5. The period beginning on 29 March 2022 and ending on 29 April 2 022
text_raw:
5. The period beginning on 29 March 2022 and ending on 29 April 2 022 

is the period prescribed for the purposes of section 4(1)(f) of the Act of 2022.
text_norm: 5 period beginning 29 march 2022 ending 29 april 2 022 period prescribed purpose section 4(1)(f) act 2022

title: (Domestic Electricity Accounts) Emergency Measures Act 2022 (No. 1 of
heading: 6. The period beginning on 1 April 2022 and ending on 30 June 2022 is
text_raw:
6. The period beginning on 1 April 2022 and ending on 30 June 2022 is 

the period prescribed for the purposes of section 5(2) of the Act of 2022. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 15th March, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform consents to the making of the 
foregoing Regulations. 

[120] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

9 March, 2022. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 

Minister for Environment, Public Expenditure and Reform. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

9 March, 2022. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for Environment, Climate and Communications.
